pages.text: The modpack has a couple of mods which make the process of farming crops and trees much simpler.

pages.title: Improved Hoes
pages.text: This mod makes higher tiers of hoes till larger areas at once.

pages.title: Keep My Soil Tilled
pages.text: This mod keeps soil tilled under a pumpkin or melon attached to a stem.

pages.title: Random Bone Meal Flowers
pages.text: When you bonemeal grass, you have a chance to get $(o)any$() flowers, not just one or two types!

pages.title: Tree Harvester
pages.text: If you crouch while breaking the bottom block of a tree, you will harvest the entire thing at once.
